translation.en: Feel free to take a seat in front of the backdrop.
translation.it: Si accomodi pure davanti al fondale.

translation.en: I will be with you in a moment.
We're also running a deal where you can get your pictures printed
translation.it: Abbiamo anche un'offerta per la stampa della foto

translation.en: on a mug and a T-shirt.
How's this for a passport photo?
-Why didn't you text me？ -[Josh] Just got back just now.
translation.it: - Perché non mi hai scritto? - Arrivo proprio ora.

translation.en: You really nailed this whole backpacking-American,
translation.it: Hai proprio azzeccato questo look da autostoppista

translation.en: My hostel was in Amsterdam. New Zealand was last month.
translation.it: Era Amsterdam. La Nuova Zelanda un mese fa.

translation.en: You're supposed to follow every single word of my travel blog.
translation.it: Dovevi seguire il blog del viaggio.
Dovevi seguire il blog del viaggio. - Che è successo? - Sono 18 mesi di post, ok?

translation.en: I'm looking at the photos, though.
Still working in this place, I see.

translation.it: - Nutre anche la tua anima? - No.

translation.en: [man] Don't let me interrupt you not doing your job, Abby.
translation.it: Continua pure a non fare il tuo lavoro, Abby.

translation.en: I need you to take this to Santa's Village, on your way home tonight.
translation.it: Porta questo al villaggio di Babbo Natale, quando finisci.

translation.en: You didn't forget that Santa's Village starts tomorrow, did you?
translation.it: Non ti sei scordata che il villaggio apre domani, vero?

translation.en: How could I forget? It's my favorite time of year.
translation.it: Come potrei? Adoro questo periodo dell'anno.

translation.en: Are you here to buy something?
This is my oldest friend, Josh.
translation.it: lui è il mio amico Josh.

translation.en: He's the one that got me into photography.
translation.it: Mi ha introdotto lui alla fotografia.

translation.en: Remember that film camera, long ago that we were learning on?
translation.it: Ricordi quella fotocamera con cui facevamo pratica?

translation.en: I think it's in a box. So you're not buying anything?
translation.it: - In qualche scatola. - Quindi non compri nulla?

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm just here to see Abby.
Then I have a box for you to take down to my car.
translation.it: Allora portami uno scatola in macchina.

translation.en: I dressed myself. I wanted to look like you.
translation.it: Mi sono vestita da sola. Per somigliare a te.

translation.en: And she nailed it. Just for the family Christmas photo.
translation.it: E c'è riuscita. In tempo per la foto di famiglia.
- Mamma è fuori di testa. - Ci credo.

translation.en: I put a little something special in there. I thought you'd need it.
translation.it: L'ho corretto, pensavo ne avessi bisogno.

translation.en: You know me so well, big sis.
What do you think of the tree?
The theme this year is "ornament splendor."
You can help me finish decorating the mantle.
I start holiday hours tomorrow, so I should be good, but thanks, Dad.
translation.it: Domani iniziano i festivi, sono a posto. Ma grazie, papà.

translation.en: He still asks me the same thing, and I work with him.
translation.it: Lo chiede anche a me, e lavoro per lui.

translation.en: I'm just saying you're welcome to join us at the law firm.
translation.it: Dico solo che allo studio saresti la benvenuta.

translation.en: [Dad] Sarah and I have a great time working together,
translation.it: Io e Sarah ci troviamo bene,

translation.en: You do know that photography is a great hobby.
translation.it: Lo sai che la fotografia è un bell'hobby.

translation.en: It's just not the safest career choice.
translation.it: Ma non è sicura, come carriera.

translation.en: You realize you tell me the same thing every time I come home, right?
translation.it: Mi ripetete le stesse cose ogni santa volta.

translation.en: Mm-hm, and that's because we're hoping that one day you'll actually hear us.
translation.it: Perché speriamo che un giorno tu ci dia ascolto.

translation.en: Nope? Just me? Okay. I'm gonna top it off.
translation.it: No? Solo io? Ok, rifaccio il pieno.

translation.en: [Mom] You are going to change your clothes for the photograph?
translation.it: Ma ti cambi i vestiti, per la foto...

translation.en: Gramps, I was wondering where you were hiding.
Hey, sweetheart. Come and give your grampops a hug.
translation.it: Tesoro, vieni ad abbracciare tuo nonno.

translation.en: Ah, I see you're making your famous chili.
translation.it: Ah, stai facendo il tuo famoso chili.

translation.en: I made a vegetarian one for you and me. Shh!
-How's it going with your new roommates? -Ah, they are so boring.
translation.it: - Come vanno i coinquilini? - Sono noiosi da morire.

translation.en: They go to bed by nine o'clock.
Then they complain my music's too loud.
I'm losing my hair and I'm getting old. How else am I supposed to play it?
translation.it: Perdo capelli e sono vecchio. Come dovrei sentirla?

translation.en: The Sutton decorating parties are like Christmas cards coming to life,
translation.it: La decorazione dei Sutton è una cartolina di auguri vivente,

translation.en: not the little flimsy dollar-store ones.
translation.it: e non quelle da due soldi.

translation.en: -What's going on, son? -Gramps! Look at you!
translation.it: - Come va, figliolo? - Nonno! Ma guardati!

translation.en: -Good to see you, man! Welcome back! -Good to see you, too.
translation.it: - Bello rivederti, benvenuto! - Anche per me.

translation.en: -Looking good! -You, too. Back in town, huh?
translation.it: - Stai bene! - Anche tu. Sei tornato?

translation.en: Everybody's gonna be so excited you're here, it'll get them off my back.
translation.it: Meno male che sei qui, così mi daranno un po' di tregua.

translation.en: -[Dad] All right, son. -[Josh] Good to see you.
-Has he gotten cuter since he’s been away? -I know what y’all are tryin’ to do.
translation.it: - Sbaglio, o è diventato più carino? - Non ci provare.

translation.en: -It’s not gonna work. We’re just friends. -Okay.
So Josh, where are you off to next?
translation.it: Josh, ora dove te ne vai?

translation.en: [Abby] What? You didn't tell me that!
Well, I'm staying with Fernando up until I find my own place,
translation.it: Starò da Fernando finché non mi sistemo.

translation.en: but one thing I do know is that
it's time for our Sutton holiday photo!
translation.it: è l'ora della foto della famiglia Sutton.

translation.en: -Can I get an "ornaments" on three? -[Mom] Yes.
Beautiful. Now can I get some smiles?
Smiles is what I need. I love a smile.
[Josh] I think we should go with the silly one. You have to.
translation.it: Penso si debba scegliere quello più sciocco.

translation.en: [Abby] All right, you bunch of hams.
[Gramps] I didn't want to give you this in front of everyone.
translation.it: Non volevo dartelo di fronte a tutti.

translation.en: I found it when I was packing my old house.
She wanted you to have it.
First Christmas without her is tough.
translation.it: Il primo Natale è il più duro.

translation.en: -[Abby] How you doing? -She's with me everyday.
translation.it: Come va? È sempre con me.

translation.en: I must admit it was hard to move, but,
she wouldn't want me to live in that big house by myself.
translation.it: non mi avrebbe voluto da solo in quel casermone.

translation.en: The kind the Europeans used to make before those flimsy, cardboard-paper kind.
translation.it: Che gli europei facevano prima di quelli scadenti in cartone.

translation.en: Are you sure she wanted me to have it and not Sarah?
translation.it: Sei sicuro di volerlo dare a me e non Sarah? Sembra più il suo stile.
Sei sicuro di volerlo dare a me e non Sarah? Sembra più il suo stile. Sicurissimo.

translation.en: Son, after all the years I’ve known you, I’ve never seen you
translation.it: Figliolo, non credo di averti mai visto

translation.en: How am I gonna say "no" to Miss Judy’s baking?
translation.it: Come dire no ai dolci di Judy?

translation.en: So, you going to stick around for a while, right?
translation.it: Allora ti fermi per un po', eh?

translation.en: -I'm here. -[Abby] Josh, I love it when you’re here.
Your appetite distracts Mom from hounding me about my life choices.
translation.it: Il tuo appetito distrae mamma dal criticare le mie scelte.

translation.en: Y'know, she actually asked me what I thought about your life choices.
translation.it: Veramente mi ha chiesto cosa ne pensassi.

translation.en: So, technically... you ain’t off the hook yet.
translation.it: Quindi, tecnicamente... non sei ancora esentata.

translation.en: -I love you, Gramps. -I love you more, sweetheart.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene, nonno. - Io di più, tesoro.

translation.en: [Gramps] I'll see you in a few.

translation.it: Niente più viaggi, allora. Sei in pensione.

translation.en: I just want to settle down.
Traveling just gave me a voice as a photographer.
translation.it: Il viaggio mi ha reso noto come fotografo.

translation.en: I know what I want to do.
I’m taking pictures. Just not the ones I want.
translation.it: Io pure fotografo, ma non quel che vorrei.

translation.en: [Abby] Burnt out from being at the studio all day.
Think I’ve just... lost my spark.
If I could have one thing…
A place where we could create and...
help support one another and be like...
the center for new talent in the area.
Oh, no, I-- I like that. That sounds amazing.
translation.it: No, mi piace l'idea. Sembra fantastico.

translation.en: The owner wants a year's rent,
-So why don’t you just-- -[stuttering] Don’t say “Ask my parents."
translation.it: - Perché non... - Non li chiederò ai miei.

translation.en: I think they’re growing tired of my starving-artist life.
translation.it: Sono stufi delle mie manie artistiche.

translation.en: You know what? I hate to admit it,
but working at my dad’s law firm doesn’t sound as terrible as it used to.
translation.it: ma il posto allo studio da avvocati di papà mi fa meno paura.
Manca l'aria a me, solo a pensarti...

translation.en: It’s easy for you to say. You’ve been traveling the world,
translation.it: Per te è facile dirlo, hai girato il mondo,

translation.en: taking photos, inspiring people, dating interesting people,
translation.it: fatto foto, ispirato gente, sei uscito con persone interessanti.

translation.en: too scared to leave my crappy day job
translation.it: ho paura di mollare quel lavoro da niente

translation.en: that I use as an excuse to not take my kind of photos.
translation.it: che uso come scusa per non fare le mie foto

translation.en: I just blurted all that out.
Will you help me drop off my bags before heading to Nando’s?
translation.it: Mi aiuti con la mia roba prima di andare da Fernando?

translation.en: not to turn into an office zombie.
translation.it: di non trasformarti in una zombie.

translation.en: This is like a whole new place.
-[Josh chuckling] Look. My picture. -Oh, you mean my picture.
translation.it: - Le mie foto. - Vuoi dire, le mie foto.

translation.en: It’s my picture. I took it. I made this.
translation.it: Sono mie, le ho fatte io.

translation.en: Yeah, but you gave it to me. It’s mine.
translation.it: Me le hai regalate, ora sono mie.

translation.en: You know what’s funny? I got the same thing on my computer.
translation.it: Che buffo, sono le stesse del mio computer.

translation.en: [Abby gasps] Ah, look at us. Best friends forever.
translation.it: Ma guarda. Amiconi per la vita.

translation.en: Where did all this come from? This wasn't hanging here before.
translation.it: E tutte queste altre? C'erano anche prima?

translation.en: I want to be fearless enough to go after my dreams, like you.
translation.it: Il coraggio di inseguire i miei sogni, come te.

translation.en: [Josh] Look at this photo. People need to see this.
translation.it: Guarda che foto. È da mostra.

translation.en: Yeah, I don’t-- I ca-- I’m not ready.
[Josh] And what d'you think will happen if...
you just let go and went for it?
I don’t know. I’d probably worry less.
Get some of these questions about my future answered.
translation.it: e ne saprei di più sul mio futuro.
È il tuo desiderio di Natale?

translation.en: It’s like a Christmas doll house… thing. Wha--
translation.it: Una specie di casa delle bambole natalizia, una...

translation.en: Try and open one of the doors.
I don't know. Maybe it just doesn’t open. I don’t know. Maybe it’s broke.
translation.it: Non so, forse non si aprono. O sono rotte.

translation.en: Maybe Gramps just gave me a defective calendar.
Gramps trying to get you -in the Christmas spirit, too? -You got somewhere to be?
translation.it: - Come il tuo spirito natalizio, eh? - Non devi andare via?

translation.en: You’re s'posed to take me to Fernando’s.
Not when you keep talkin’ about Christmas stuff all the time. You forgot.
translation.it: - Non se continui a parlare di Natale. - L'avevi scordato.

translation.en: [choir sings] ♪ Follow me in merry measure ♪
♪ While I tell of yule-tide treasure ♪
translation.it: While I tell of Yule-tide treasure

translation.en: ♪ See the blazing yule before us ♪
translation.it: See the blazing yule before us

translation.en: Let the 24 days of holiday hell begin.
translation.it: Che le infernali feste abbiano inizio.

translation.en: Guess you decided to work after all.
Everyone will have their time with Santa. Okay?
translation.it: Farete tutti la foto con Babbo Natale, ok?

translation.en: -[Santa] There you go, sweetheart. -[Singh] Very nice.
That’s very nice. You keep your list. Okay.
[Singh] Okay. Who’s the next kid? Who’s the next in line?
translation.it: Ok, chi è il prossimo? Avanti!

translation.en: I thought we had extra help this year.
All the college students I hired got poached by the Christmas train.
translation.it: Gli studenti che avevo li hanno presi per il trenino.

translation.en: That's it. I'm calling in the cavalry.
[Santa] Fernando! It's such a pleasure to see you.
Josh, yes. I know you. You can help me wrangle the kids.
translation.it: Ah, sì, mi ricordo. Mi aiuterai a gestire i bambini.

translation.en: Hey, what about me? [sings] Elf Fernan... do! What can I do?
translation.it: Ehi, e io? Elfo Fernando. Che faccio?

translation.en: That kind of enthusiasm gets you on crowd control.
translation.it: Con quell'entusiasmo, terrai a bada la folla.

translation.en: I also work as a Uber driver, a dog walker, and a Christmas caroler.
translation.it: Ho fatto l'autista Uber, il dog sitter e conosco i canti natalizi.

translation.en: I’m not sure why you told me about the first two, but...
translation.it: I primi due non mi interessano, ma puoi cantare per i bambini impazienti in fila.

translation.en: you can sing to the children as they impatiently wait in line.
translation.it: ma puoi cantare per i bambini impazienti in fila.

translation.en: I’m not going to disappoint you, Santa.
Great! Okay, let’s see some Christmas cheer.
translation.it: Ottimo! Dai, vediamo un po' di gioia natalizia.

translation.en: Wanna go see that guy? You know who that guy is.
translation.it: Vedi quel signore? Lo sai chi è.

translation.en: Santa Claus. Tell him anything. Anything you want.
translation.it: Babbo Natale. Digli quel che desideri.

translation.en: [boy] I want candy. Josh, thanks for this.
I promise overtime and holiday pay.
Stop. I’ve always wanted to be in an elf costume, so thank you.
translation.it: Smettila. Ho sempre sognato di fare l'elfo, perciò grazie.

translation.en: [Singh] That was a good one. I can feel it.
Let’s go. This job is awesome. Let’s go.
translation.it: Andiamo. È un lavoro fichissimo. Dai.

translation.en: -We were supposed to meet for lunch. -I know.
Urgent matter. Okay? Had to go to my apartment…
I didn’t know we were doing presents.
Plus, I know you’re on this anti-commercial holiday kick.
translation.it: E poi, lo so che odi il lato consumistico.

translation.en: Look, it’s not even a Christmas present.
translation.it: Non è neanche un vero regalo.

translation.en: It’s just a gift I’m getting you around this time of year. Coincidence.
translation.it: Più un pensiero per farti superare questo periodo. Coincidenza.

translation.en: -If you don’t want it-- -I don't want to be rude.
translation.it: - Se non lo vuoi... - Sarebbe scortese.

translation.en: -Can I open it now? -What you waitin’ on?
-Really. They're like-- -[Josh] Actually, I should have.
translation.it: Davvero. Sono... - Invece sì. E sai perché? - Perché?
- Invece sì. E sai perché? - Perché?

translation.en: -all this duct tape on your shoes-- -That’s what makes ’em cool.
translation.it: - Quel nastro adesivo sulle scarpe... - Le rende fighe.
Ok. Ma questi lo sono di più.

translation.en: I thought they looked like you.
-I am so sorry, OK. It's the weekend... -♪...and a happy new year ♪
translation.it: Mi spiace, Babbo Natale doveva essere già qui,

translation.en: [Abby] Oh, I almost forgot to tell you.
Yesterday I woke up, and the door for December 1st was open. And today, the 2nd.
translation.it: Ieri si è aperta la porta del 1° dicembre. E oggi quella del due.

translation.en: -Must be on a timer or something, right? -Was there something cool inside?
translation.it: - Forse c'è un timer, no? - Che c'era dentro?

translation.en: Just little toys. But get this.
But, wait. I want to tell her.
the greatest Christmas movie of all time is playing at The Roxy
translation.it: il più bel film di Natale di sempre arriva al Roxy tra due settimane!
arriva al Roxy tra due settimane!

translation.en: A Christmas Story. And the three of us are going together!
translation.it: Una storia di Natale! E noi tre si va a vederlo!

translation.en: Maybe four of us, if I find a girlfriend, but that’s probably not gonna happen.
translation.it: Magari in quattro se trovo una fidanzata, ma è poco probabile.

translation.en: It’s amazing because everyone dresses up as their favorite character.
translation.it: È bello perché ci si traveste coi costumi dei personaggi.

translation.en: Oh. I got dibs on the leg lamp.
translation.it: Io sono la lampada a gamba.

translation.en: The leg lamp is my costume. Okay? [angrily] Back off! My idea!
translation.it: No, è il mio, ok? Levatevelo dalla mente. È stata una mia idea.

translation.en: That... is a Christmas tradition I can get behind.
translation.it: Questa... è l'unica tradizione natalizia che mi piace.

translation.en: [Abby] That tree came out of nowhere!
[man] I'm so sorry. I guess I didn't tie it down properly.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, - non l'ho stretto bene. - Ma chi non lega

translation.en: Who doesn’t tie down a tree that’s on top of their car?
translation.it: - non l'ho stretto bene. - Ma chi non lega un albero sull'auto?

translation.en: [man] That would be me. Are you okay? How’s your car?
translation.it: Io, ad esempio. Stai bene? E la macchina?
Tutto a posto. È colpa mia, al vivaio avevano delle corde elastiche, ma non le ho prese.

translation.en: The guy at the tree farm recommended bungees, not twine, I didn't listen.
translation.it: È colpa mia, al vivaio avevano delle corde elastiche, ma non le ho prese.

translation.en: Yeah, well there’s a reason why twine jumping never caught on.
translation.it: È per questo che il bungee jumping non ha attecchito.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's funny. It's a good sign if you can make bad jokes at a time like this.
translation.it: Bella battuta, specialmente se fatta in occasioni così.

translation.en: I’m pretty sure it died when I chopped it down.
That would make you an ax murderer.
I’m wanted at three different Christmas tree farms.
I’m gonna have to make a citizen’s arrest.
[laughing] Okay, you win. I can’t keep up.
It’s from my emergency roadside assistance kit, and technically,
translation.it: Sono del kit di emergenza stradale, e questa... tecnicamente lo è.

translation.en: I should probably do this with a bigger car.
I didn’t sleep very much last night.
She found it in a shop in France just before we met.
translation.it: Lo trovò in un negozio in Francia, prima di conoscermi.

translation.en: I was on leave from the Air Force.
We passed each other in the entrance to the Louvre.
She dropped a book in the snow and...
translation.it: Le cadde un libro nella neve e...

translation.en: I can’t believe I never knew any of this.
This is the time of the year I miss her the most.
translation.it: In questo periodo mi manca di più.

translation.en: It’s funny, 'cause she was so much like you.
Never bought into all this holiday hoopla.
translation.it: Neanche lei amava questo caos festivo.

translation.en: Well, it looks like you have plenty of company, if you want it.
translation.it: La compagnia non ti mancherebbe, se volessi.

translation.en: That’s the problem with having a great love.
translation.it: È il problema di un grande amore.

translation.en: The “pretty good” ones don’t stand a chance.
translation.it: Il normale non ti basta più.

translation.en: I’m heading to meet the guys over at the hobby shop. You want to join?
translation.it: Vado con amici al negozio di bricolage. Vuoi venire?

translation.en: Just a bunch of old cats playing with toy trains.
translation.it: Dei vecchietti che giocano ai trenini.

translation.en: I’ll see you at Corinne’s Christmas pageant later.
translation.it: Ci vediamo alla sfilata di Corinne.

translation.en: Is that today? Ah, I totally forgot. Don’t tell Sarah.
translation.it: È oggi? L'avevo dimenticata. Non dirlo a Sarah.

translation.en: That calendar’s just a calendar, right?
Come here! You were so fantastic, Corinne.
translation.it: Vieni qui! Sei stata splendida, Corinne.

translation.en: I think I was the only one without a camera phone in front of my face.
translation.it: Ero l'unico senza smartphone davanti al viso.

translation.en: You were the best Sugar Plum Fairy up there.
translation.it: Eri la fatina Confetto più bella, sul palco.

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, but it’s not a competition.
translation.it: Sì, ma non è una gara.

translation.en: Everyone is the best just for participating.
[lowers voice] But she was the best by far.
By any chance, did you murder my tree with your car?
translation.it: Per caso l'hai investito tu, il mio albero?

translation.en: First of all, that tree was already a goner.
Any chance I could get the name of my accomplice in tree crimes?
translation.it: E come si chiamerebbe, la mia complice?

translation.en: -You have a kid that goes here? -No way. I don’t have a kid.
translation.it: - Hai figli qui? - No, non ne ho.

translation.en: Don’t get me wrong. I want kids maybe... one day.
I just haven’t made one yet.
But I do have a niece, Corinne.
with the rest of the other staring people.
[Dad] I don't know who she's talking to.
She's in second grade. She's around here somewhere.
translation.it: Fa la seconda. È qui in giro.

translation.en: There she is! Hey, come over here, Jess!
Don’t judge her outfit too harshly. I’m a single dad with no sewing skills.
translation.it: Non guardare il costume, sono single e non so cucire.

translation.en: -I should probably get her home. -Yeah. No, it’s getting late.
translation.it: - Dovrei portarla a casa. - Sì, è tardi.

translation.en: -It was great running into you again. -So great seeing you.
translation.it: - È stato bello rivederti. - Anche per me.

translation.en: Do you know who that was?
Ty hit me with a tree.
translation.it: Ty mi ha colpito con un albero.

translation.en: Ty Walker is the school's most eligible bachelor.
translation.it: Ty Walker è lo scapolo d'oro della scuola.

translation.en: Amicable divorce, great job, and that’s all his hair.
translation.it: Divorzio consensuale, ottimo lavoro e ancora coi capelli.

translation.en: Some of the single moms actually wear their nice yoga pants
translation.it: Le mamme single indossano i leggings

translation.en: to drop off their kids, all in hopes to get a piece of him.
translation.it: quando accompagnano i figli solo per farsi notare da lui,

translation.en: And here he is, flirting with my little sister.
translation.it: che invece flirta con la mia sorellina.

translation.en: God, you’re gonna use this to lord over them with, aren’t you?
translation.it: Oddio, mi userai contro di loro, vero?

translation.en: Oh, you have no idea how cutthroat elementary school is.
translation.it: Non hai idea di che massacro sia la scuola.

translation.en: Speaking of, I need you to come through with some awesome
translation.it: A proposito, dovresti donare qualche bella foto per l'asta di beneficienza.

translation.en: photos for the school’s charity auction. It’s the 22nd.
translation.it: bella foto per l'asta di beneficienza. È il 22.

translation.en: I am gonna crush this auction.
-[Mom] Are you heading out? -Yeah. See you guys later.
You’re scaring me with your panicked text messages.
translation.it: Mi hai spaventato con quei messaggi.

translation.en: I have to tell you something, but I need you to not think
translation.it: Devo dirti una cosa, ma non pensare che sia, tipo,
Devo dirti una cosa, ma non pensare che sia, tipo, fuori di testa.

translation.en: That ship has sailed. Can you just tell me?
-[Josh] Oh, the... three little toys. -[Abby] Right.
translation.it: Oh, il... - Giusto. - I tre giocattoli.

translation.en: How much wine have you had tonight?

translation.it: Che poi tu mi hai regalato.

translation.en: Yeah, I gave you boots. But...
translation.it: Sì, ti ho regalato degli stivali.

translation.en: I got those when I was away,
not because of a freaky calendar telling me to do so.
translation.it: e non dietro l'influsso di un calendario.

translation.en: And maybe because I'm a wonderful friend
-an equally as dope gift in return. -Josh!
Day two, I got a Christmas tree toy and then the car ran over a Christmas tree.
translation.it: Giorno due, esce l'albero di Natale, e guarda l'incidente che poi è successo.

translation.en: Right, that is a little weird, but...
translation.it: Ok, è un po' strano, ma...

translation.en: that just seems like a coincidence.
d'you kick somebody in the nutcracker?
translation.it: Hai schiacciato le palle a qualcuno?

translation.en: I met the daughter of the guy whose Christmas tree I ran over,
translation.it: ho conosciuto la figlia di quello dell'albero di Natale,

translation.en: and his daughter was dressed as a nutcracker.
translation.it: che guarda caso aveva un costume da schiaccianoci.

translation.en: And the strangest part about that is, I actually hit it off with her dad.
translation.it: E la cosa buffa è che il padre mi piace.

translation.en: Are we talking about him or the calendar?
translation.it: Parliamo di lui, o del calendario?

translation.en: What else do you think is inside?
I don’t know. The door doesn’t open until midnight.
translation.it: Non lo so, la porta si apre a mezzanotte.

translation.en: Well, I’ll wait up with you.
Was thinking about going to get some water.
You want some water? I want some water.
Ha, ha, ha, you're so funny.
[Abby] It looks like the wind's picking up.
[Josh] Thank you all for coming to Santa’s village.
translation.it: Benvenuti al villaggio di Babbo Natale.

translation.en: D'you feel like you’re waiting for something to happen? ’Cause I do.
translation.it: Sai quella sensazione che stia per succedere qualcosa? Ecco.

translation.en: You know it doesn’t help that we’re in candy cane central.
translation.it: Beh, siamo circondati da bastoncini di zucchero.

translation.en: [Josh] Hey, kid, you ready to go see Santa Claus?
translation.it: Ciao, sei pronto per Babbo Natale?

translation.en: -[woman] Please. Do it for Mama, Mason. -It’s Santa Claus.
translation.it: - Fallo per la mamma, Mason. - È Babbo Natale.

translation.en: -[Josh] Come on, kid. -[Mason] I don't wanna go.
translation.it: - Coraggio! Forza, ragazzo. - Non ci voglio andare.

translation.en: Get your picture taken with old Santa.
translation.it: Fai una foto con Babbo Natale.

translation.en: Now look right there in the camera.
-Ow! Hey! -[Singh] Where are your paren-- Hey!
translation.it: Dove sono i tuoi gen... Ehi!

translation.en: No, you might’ve sprained that. I think you should get that checked out.
translation.it: No, forse è slogato, dovresti farlo vedere.

translation.en: It’s no big deal. I’m good.
translation.it: Non è niente di che, sto bene.

translation.en: -Go to the clinic, please. -There’s a line of people waiting
translation.it: - Vai in ambulatorio. - C'è la fila

translation.en: to get their picture with Santa. I can't just leave.
translation.it: per la foto con Babbo Natale. - Non posso andarmene. - Per caso conosci un fotografo?

translation.en: Who else do you know that’s a photographer? Hmm.
translation.it: - Non posso andarmene. - Per caso conosci un fotografo?
Ci penso io. Vai, per favore.

translation.en: You should go. I can’t have runaway candy cane injuries on my conscience.
translation.it: Vai, non posso avere una vittima dei dolcetti sulla coscienza.

translation.en: Says here we have a potential sprain by candy cane.
translation.it: Qui dice: "Possibile slogatura da bastoncino di zucchero".

translation.en: A lot of that going around lately.
Yeah, that’s me. Abby the mortified elf.
Oh, first the tree. Now this.
Nothing an ibuprofen and a drink won’t fix.
translation.it: Basta un analgesico e un drink.

translation.en: Are you allowed to prescribe that?
That was actually my lame doctor way of asking you out.
translation.it: In realtà era un modo per invitarti a uscire.

translation.en: I’ll see you around 6:00 at Santa’s village?
Must’ve got some good meds, huh?
I have a date with Ty tonight.
He was the clinic doctor. The calendar called it.
translation.it: È il dottore dell'ambulatorio. Il calendario lo sapeva.

translation.en: I was thinking of sneaking out around 5:00 to go home and change.
translation.it: Pensavo di uscire alle cinque per andare a cambiarmi.

translation.en: -Do you think you could cover for me? -Yeah.
There’s a guy? I thought you were the guy.
translation.it: Uno? Pensavo fossi tu, il tizio.

translation.en: I’m here for you. I'm here for you, okay?
translation.it: Se serve, io ci sono, ok?

translation.en: You got here just in time.
I didn’t know drinks were time-sensitive.
So, I got us this ride.
translation.it: E ho pensato a un passaggio.

translation.en: The nearest café is literally hundreds of steps away, and it could take us
translation.it: Il bar è a un centinaio di passi e ci metteremmo

translation.en: almost three minutes to walk there.
Plus, I already got us tickets, so…
translation.it: E poi ho preso i biglietti, perciò...

translation.en: This is not the drink I had imagined
translation.it: Non è... il drink che immaginavo

translation.en: when you asked me out on a date, but…
So, what else do you do when you’re not…
I want to be a photographer.
I mean, I am a photographer. I work at this...
translation.it: Cioè, già lo sono perché lavoro

translation.en: We take all the holiday photos that are probably hanging up on your fridge.
translation.it: Faccio foto per le feste che finiscono sui frigoriferi.

translation.en: But I don’t know how long I’m gonna work there. I mean, I--
translation.it: Ma non so per quanto ancora resisterò.

translation.en: I want to have my own space.

translation.it: - Per fare le stesse foto? - No.

translation.en: that’s a long way off, I mean, if it happens at all--
translation.it: un sogno, cioè, semmai mi capitasse.

translation.en: Uh, both my parents are surgeons,
So you just got into the family business?
But I’m the rebel for opening a clinic instead of becoming a surgeon.
translation.it: Ma sono un ribelle per aver aperto una clinica invece di fare il chirurgo.

translation.en: You know, my family wishes I would rebel in that way.
translation.it: I miei amerebbero una ribellione così.

translation.en: We should do it again sometime. I’d like that.
I’ve been wanting to kiss you all night.
translation.it: È tutta la sera che desidero baciarti.

translation.en: -You don’t have my number. -What are you waiting for?
translation.it: - Non hai il mio numero. - E che aspetti?

translation.en: -[Josh] What’s up? How are you? -What up?
Looks like you got your photo mojo back.
translation.it: Ti è tornata la voglia di scattare.

translation.en: What’s creepy calendar? Come on. What did it predict today?
translation.it: E il calendario stregato? Che prevede per oggi?

translation.en: I don’t know. I decided to risk it and not check.
translation.it: Non lo so, non ho voluto guardare.

translation.en: Well, tell me about this ride with the doc.
You gotta give him points for creativity.
translation.it: Devi ammettere che è un creativo.

translation.en: I mean, did the date go well?
♪ I'm putting on my Christmas stockings ♪ ♪ Find a nice dress to wear ♪
♪ Better hurry There's no time to lose ♪ ♪ 'Cause I got so many Christmas kisses for you ♪
♪ The bells are ringing oh so pretty ♪
[Gramps] Haven’t seen much of you lately.
Is it work or that new fella's got you so preoccupied?
translation.it: È il lavoro o il nuovo ragazzo, che ti occupa di più?

translation.en: Now, you know Sarah’s been updating us.
planning these elaborate dates and showering me with gifts...
translation.it: stupirmi con queste uscite, e mi copre di regali.

translation.en: I was gonna say “flattering,” but yeah,
We’re spending all this time together, but...
it’s not like we’re really getting to know each other.
If you feel like he’s worth getting to know, you should
translation.it: Se pensi che ne valga la pena,

translation.en: You can decide your next step based on what you learn.
translation.it: Decidi come muoverti in base a quel che sai.

translation.en: -[Gramps] Age equals wisdom. -Oh, you’re so wise.
translation.it: - Oh, è l'età. - No, sei saggio.

translation.en: I figured you and him would have gotten together by now.
translation.it: Ho pensato che sarebbe stato lui.

translation.en: Josh has girlfriends all over the world.
Yeah, but he came back here, didn't he?
Hey! How about one of those cookies, son?
translation.it: Ehi! Non li assaggiamo, quei biscotti?

translation.en: I got one with your name on it.
-[Gramps] You got us. -[Abby] Caught in the act.
Um, well, we actually took a little vote and decided
translation.it: Noi, ecco, abbiamo votato e deciso

translation.en: that you can be the leg lamp.
translation.it: che puoi fare tu la lampada.

translation.en: [Fernando] For the movie, A Christmas Story.
translation.it: Per il film, Una storia di Natale.

translation.en: I have a date, with Ty.
[Fernando] Fine. I will be the leg lamp.
Okay. I just need to find the leg, but--
translation.it: Devo solo trovare la gamba, ma...

translation.en: I can still be the leg lamp.
I’m seeing him at three o'clock, so I can meet you at the theater after.
translation.it: Esco con lui alle tre, vengo direttamente al cinema.

translation.en: Does this look like a face that would break a promise?
translation.it: Ti sembro una che non mantiene le promesse?

translation.en: I’m stumped. I have no idea what this date is.
translation.it: Sono confusa. Su che verte l'appuntamento?

translation.en: [Ty] It is the season of giving.
And we’re gonna do a little giving back.
I try to come once a month.
translation.it: Vengo circa una volta al mese.

translation.en: Sometimes I bring Jess. I think it's important for her to know how fortunate we are.
translation.it: A volte porto Jess. È importante che sappia quant'è fortunata.

translation.en: And you think I need that, too?
We all do. The real reward is
translation.it: Vale per tutti. Il vero premio

translation.en: knowing we make life a little better for these folks.
translation.it: è aiutare questa gente in difficoltà.

translation.en: Are saints like you allowed to date mere humans like me?
translation.it: Ai santi è permesso uscire con i mortali come me?

translation.en: [Fernando] Do you think she’s gonna make it?
She said she's gonna come, she’s--
-We have time, man. -What are you doing with that cell phone?
translation.it: - C'è tempo. - Che fai con quel cellulare?

translation.en: No one used cell phones in A Christmas Story.
translation.it: Non esiste in Una storia di Natale.

translation.en: -It’s 1983. -Can you get out of character for...
translation.it: - È il 1983. - Puoi uscire dal personaggio per...

translation.en: I don’t know what you’re talking about because I am Ralphie.
translation.it: Non so di che parli, io sono Ralphie.

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Do you guys mind if I take some pictures of you?
Oh, you can take mine, but, uh,
don’t take his ugly mug. It might break the camera.
translation.it: a questo brutto no, romperesti l'obiettivo.

translation.en: -I was pretty handsome in my younger days. -Oh...

translation.it: Peccato non ci fosse ancora la fotografia.

translation.en: You guys are old friends, huh?
I’ve been putting up with him for…
I have a best friend like that.

translation.it: Ti ci ha mandata il giudice?

translation.en: The guy that I’m dating brought me here.
translation.it: Mi ha portato il mio ragazzo.

translation.en: Yeah, we’ve seen him here a few times.
Yeah, he likes to bring people by and, uh, show ’em how good he is.
translation.it: Ama portare qui la gente per far vedere quant'è buono.

translation.en: He said he brought his daughter here a few times.
translation.it: Ma è venuto anche con la figlia.

translation.en: I'm going to let you in on a little secret,
and it's not because you're enamored by my beauty.
translation.it: e non perché mi trovi affascinante.

translation.en: People can show you whatever they want.
translation.it: La gente ti mostra quel che vuole.

translation.en: But it's how they make you feel... that counts.
translation.it: Ma è quel che ti fa provare, ciò che conta.

translation.en: [man 2] And how you make them feel, too.
translation.it: E come li fai sentire tu.

translation.en: Oh yeah, let’s do one of these.
[cinema advert] You have 30 seconds to answer.
-[Fernando] Josh? -Which holiday movie has been remade
translation.it: - Josh? - Quale film festivo è stato rifatto
The night before Christmas, La vita è meravigliosa

translation.en: -You have 30 seconds to answer. -[Fernando] Get-- Okay.
I think I got some great shots.
You too. Have a great Christmas.
Looks like you made new friends.
-Have you ever talked to them? -So many people go through the food line, it’s hard to remember.
translation.it: - Ci hai mai parlato? - Sono tanti, non li ricordo tutti.

translation.en: Well, they have a really interesting history.
I try not to get too attached. It’s the doctor in me.
translation.it: Cerco di non affezionarmi. Come un dottore.

translation.en: Yeah. No. Can we go to the Roxy?
translation.it: Sì. No, possiamo andare al Roxy?

translation.en: A Christmas Story is playing, and--
translation.it: Danno Una storia di Natale e...

translation.en: What’s the big deal? It plays nonstop
translation.it: E allora? Lo tengono per tutte le feste.

translation.en: -all through the holidays. -My friends are in there.
translation.it: E allora? Lo tengono per tutte le feste. C'erano i miei amici.

translation.en: I said that I would see it with them.
You were doing something way more important than a movie.
translation.it: Stavi facendo qualcosa di ben più importante.

translation.en: -These are great. Are all these yours? -Mm-hm.
You’re always taking pictures, aren’t you?
Uh, my friend Josh took that one.
translation.it: Quella è del mio amico Josh.

translation.en: Reminds me of one of Jess’s selfies.
translation.it: Mi ricorda i selfie di Jess.

translation.en: Oh, we have one of these at our house.
translation.it: Oh, ne abbiamo una anche noi.

translation.en: -Except ours is made of cardboard. -Oh, yeah?
translation.it: - Ma è di cartone. - Ah, sì?

translation.en: Oh, wait. Uh, no, no, no. It’s really--
It’s an antique, so it’s, like--
What kind of candy is in yours?
I just realized something and it shouldn't surprise me anymore,
translation.it: appena capito una cosa, che non dovrebbe stupirmi,

translation.en: the day that I met you,
I got a Christmas tree toy from the calendar, and then...
translation.it: dal calendario era uscito un albero di Natale...

translation.en: your tree fell on my car.
translation.it: quello poi caduto dalla tua auto.

translation.en: It's been like that all month long.
translation.it: Tutto il mese è stato così.
Ogni giorno, una porta si apre

translation.en: the toy inside matches something that happens.
translation.it: il giocattolo predice quel che succederà.

translation.en: Like today, the men at the shelter were obviously the three wise men.
translation.it: Oggi, quelli alla mensa, erano ovviamente i Re Magi.

translation.en: It sounds like the Christmas equivalent of having your horoscope read.
“Oh, I’m a Virgo. My horoscope says I’m gonna meet someone new today.”
Well, of course, if you leave your house,
the chance of you meeting someone new increases exponentially.
translation.it: è ovvio che incontrerai qualcuno nuovo.

translation.en: You mocked me a little. No?
-[Ty] Come on. It’s kinda funny. -It’s not funny.
translation.it: - Dai, è buffo. - No, non lo è.

translation.en: Ah, you’re too smart to believe that
translation.it: Sei troppo in gamba per credere

translation.en: a toy-filled calendar is controlling your life.
translation.it: che un calendario controlli la tua vita.

translation.en: -I’m just being a realist here. -You’re kinda being a jerk about it though.
translation.it: - Sono realistico. - Ma in modo antipatico, però.

translation.en: Why are you so sensitive all of a sudden?
Hey, Ty, I have a question.
How many girls have you taken to see you do good work at the shelter?
translation.it: Quante ragazze hai portato con te alla mensa?

translation.en: Well, the two wise men seem to think that’s a common date spot for you.
translation.it: I due "Re Magi" pare ti abbiano visto in più occasioni.

translation.en: You’re taking dating advice from two guys that live on the street?
translation.it: Ti fai mettere la pulce nell'orecchio da due senzatetto?

translation.en: I thought you cared about the people at the shelter.
translation.it: Pensavo ti importasse, di loro. O è tutta scena?

translation.en: -Or is that just all for show? -That’s not what I’m saying.
translation.it: Pensavo ti importasse, di loro. O è tutta scena? Non è quel che ho detto.

translation.en: What do you know about me?
What do you know about me?
I mean, what do I even know about you, right?
translation.it: E anche io, cosa so di te?

translation.en: We haven’t even had a real conversation up until now.
translation.it: Ma non abbiamo parlato veramente, a parte ora.

translation.en: -I thought you were having a good time. -I am.
But I-- You know, I need more than someone that just looks good on paper.
translation.it: Ma io... credo di aver bisogno di più di uno da fotoromanzo.

translation.en: You know, I need someone real.
Someone who’s not gonna judge me.
You want to take some space...
translation.it: Ti serve un po' di spazio...

translation.en: You’re breaking up with me over a calendar?
I was with my gramps this morning, okay?
translation.it: Ero... con mio nonno, stamattina, ok?
È lui il terzo Re Magio.

translation.en: [sighing] You can open up that door
I’m in a fight with a calendar.

translation.it: Che c'è? Ho visto il messaggio.

translation.en: The mayor’s doing a tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.it: Viene il sindaco ad accendere l'albero.

translation.en: I might have, sort of, broken up with Ty.
You might have? Sort of? You did? Did.
I made the mistake of showing him my calendar.
translation.it: Ho sbagliato a mostrargli il calendario.

translation.en: It all went downhill from there.
You want me to go beat him up, or what?
translation.it: Vuoi che lo picchi, o che?

translation.en: No, he’s probably, like, a black belt in karate or something.
translation.it: No, probabilmente è cintura nera di karate, o altro.

translation.en: I feel like a jerk for missing the movie.
translation.it: Mi sento una cretina per aver perso il film.

translation.en: That wasn’t cool, standing me up. That’s--
I can't stay mad at that.
translation.it: Non riesco a tenerti il muso.

translation.en: What are you two standing around for?
and her official photographer has the flu.
translation.it: e il suo fotografo ha l'influenza.

translation.en: Grab your camera, Abby. They’re going to need pictures.
translation.it: Prendi la fotocamera, Abby. Serviranno foto.
My true love gave to me

translation.en: ♪ A partridge in a pear tree ♪
translation.it: a partridge in a pear tree

translation.en: ♪ On the second day of Christmas ♪
translation.it: On the second day of Christmas

translation.en: ♪ My true love gave to me Two turtle doves ♪
translation.it: my true love gave to me two turtle doves

translation.en: -♪ And a partridge in a pear tree ♪ -[mayor] Thank you so much for coming.
translation.it: - and a partridge in a pear tree - Grazie per essere venuti!

translation.en: Come. The mayor wants to meet you.
Here. I’ll load it. Go meet the mayor.
translation.it: Dammi, le carico io. Vai dal sindaco.

translation.en: -Oh, thank you for coming. -[woman] Thank you.
I would like you to meet photographer, Abby Sutton.
translation.it: Le presento la fotografa, Abby Sutton.

translation.en: and I'm sure you're going to be pleased with her work.
translation.it: sono certo che ammirerà il suo lavoro.

translation.en: Thank you so much for stepping up today, Abby. I can't wait to see your photographs.
translation.it: Grazie per l'aiuto, Abby. Non vedo l'ora di ammirare i tuoi scatti.

translation.en: Well, I've been working on a new series.
translation.it: Beh, sto lavorando a una nuova serie.

translation.en: It's been focusing on capturing the town in unexpected ways.
translation.it: Parti della città riprese da un'altra angolatura.

translation.en: Send me a link to your stuff.
I need some fresh images for my office.
translation.it: Mi servono nuove foto per l'ufficio.

translation.en: -I'd love to see what you have. Okay. Bye. -[Singh] Merry Christmas.
translation.it: - Vediamo cos'hai. Ok, arrivederci! - Buon Natale.

translation.en: Get me the best shots, and I’ll send them to the mayor
translation.it: Mandami le migliori, le giro al sindaco

translation.en: and to the newspaper before anybody else can.
The mayor wants to see my photography.
translation.it: Il sindaco vuole vedere le mie foto.

translation.en: It’s the break I’ve been looking for.
I don’t like that face. What’s going on?
When I was trying to load the card in the computer…
translation.it: Mentre stavo caricando la scheda sul computer...

translation.en: ...this family came by, was talking to me,
asking about when Santa Claus was coming back.
when they was talking to me, I…
I'm working on recovering the photos, but there's no guarantee that it will work.
translation.it: Sto cercando di recuperarle, ma non so se funzionerà.

translation.en: You should pack your things and go.
Josh can take over as full-time photographer.
translation.it: Josh ti sostituirà come fotografo a tempo pieno.

translation.en: I just heard you talking to Singh. What did he say?
translation.it: Ti ho visto parlare con Singh. Che ha detto?

translation.en: Are you going to re-shoot the mayor?
I would if I didn’t just get fired.
translation.it: Sì, se non mi avesse licenziata.

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yep! I'm giving my job to you. Congrats.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì! Congratulazioni per il nuovo lavoro.

translation.en: It was my fault. Look. I can go tell Singh right now.
translation.it: è stata colpa mia. Senti, glielo vado a dire.

translation.en: It's my card. It's my responsibility. I'm the one who let it outta my sight.
translation.it: La scheda era mia responsabilità. Io l'ho persa di vista.

translation.en: But you gave it to me.
There's no reason for both of us to lose our jobs.
translation.it: Inutile farsi licenziare tutti e due.

translation.en: You knew how much I needed this break, and now it's ruined.
translation.it: Lo sai da quanto aspettavo questo momento.

translation.en: So yeah, I'm mad at you.
I would never do anything to hurt you ever,
translation.it: Non ti farei mai del male,

translation.en: but I can’t help the fact that I’m still angry, at you.
translation.it: Sì, ma non posso non essere arrabbiata con te.

translation.en: you standing me up for Mr. Dream Doctor Dude-
translation.it: il bidone del film con il super dottore...

translation.en: I don’t need you, and I don’t need this job, and I don’t need any of this.
translation.it: Non ho bisogno di te, né del lavoro e neanche di tutto il resto.

translation.en: That’s not how friends treat each other, Abby.
translation.it: Non si trattano così gli amici, Abby.

translation.en: [woman] You just answered so I know you are.
Sarah, I really don’t feel like having any…
translation.it: Sarah, non ho proprio voglia di...

translation.en: It reeks like a pity party in here.
translation.it: Hai dato una festa per l'autocompassione.

translation.en: Gramps. He ran into Josh while hoofing it down Main Street.
translation.it: Il nonno. Ha incontrato Josh sulla via principale.

translation.en: Great. My personal drama is trending.

translation.it: Ti capisco. Le rotture fanno male. E perdere il lavoro peggiora le cose.

translation.en: And losing a job, even a crappy one, sucks even more.
translation.it: Le rotture fanno male. E perdere il lavoro peggiora le cose.

translation.en: But pushing away the people that care about you is just selfish, Abs.
translation.it: Ma respingere chi ti vuole bene è da egoisti, Abby.

translation.en: If you came here to try to make me feel better, it's not working.
translation.it: Se sei venuta a consolarmi, non sta funzionando.

translation.en: worships you, and no matter how bad you may...
think your life is, she’s still going to worship you.
translation.it: quanto tu possa odiare la vita, continuerà a farlo.

translation.en: All she’s been talking about is how her cool Aunt Abby
translation.it: Dice che la sua fighissima zia Abby

translation.en: is bringing her pictures to the auction tomorrow.
Can I please just send the photos with you?
translation.it: Oh, ti prego, non puoi farlo tu?

translation.en: I really don’t want to see anyone,
especially Ty. I do not want to see him.
Which is why I’m here to tell you to get it together.
Because I will not let you disappoint Corinne,
and I definitely won’t let you give up on yourself.
You know you’re my favorite sister,
-I think I’m your only sister. - Okay. Go take a shower.
translation.it: - Sono l'unica. - Ok. Ti serve una doccia.

translation.en: You smell like Cheetos and sadness.
Is this place no longer for rent?
Your tough love worked. I decided to stop feeling sorry for myself and...
translation.it: Ci sei riuscita. Ho deciso di smettere di compiangermi

translation.en: I have a surprise for you. For the auction. I think you’re gonna like it.
translation.it: Ho una sorpresa per te. Cioè, per l'asta. Ti piacerà.

translation.en: My sister’s donations are in her car.
translation.it: Mia sorella ha le donazioni in auto.

translation.en: In the trunk. Can you get someone to unload them, please?
You’re having way too much fun throwing your PTA president power around.
translation.it: Ti diverti troppo a fare il presidente dell'ente.

translation.en: [girl in crowd] Santa’s right there. I’m so excited.
translation.it: È arrivato Babbo Natale, che bello.

translation.en: If you're looking for Josh, he's not here.
translation.it: Se cerchi Josh, non è qui.

translation.en: He quit. After I fired you,
translation.it: Ha mollato. Dopo che ti ho licenziata

translation.en: he came around talking about solidarity,
how you took the fall for him.
translation.it: di come tu ti sia presa la colpa.

translation.en: I can’t believe Josh quit for me.
I wanted to give this to you.
It's the pictures from the tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.it: Sono le foto della cerimonia col sindaco.

translation.en: I wasn't able to salvage all of them, but there might be...
translation.it: Non le ho recuperate tutte, ma...

translation.en: ones on there that you can use.
I mean, it’s probably too late, but...
I’ll send them to the mayor’s office.

translation.it: Mi spiace per quel che è successo.

translation.en: it’s going to be a Christmas massacre here,
if these people don’t get their Santa photos.
translation.it: se questi non fanno la foto col Babbo.

translation.en: Uh, Mrs. Singh, the lens cap.
You don't have to tell my wife what to do, Bob.
translation.it: Non dare ordini a mia moglie, Bob.

translation.en: And if you want your old job back, it is yours.
translation.it: E se vuoi il lavoro, puoi riprendertelo.

translation.en: I appreciate every opportunity that you’ve given me, Mr. Singh, but I...
translation.it: apprezzo le opportunità che mi ha concesso, Sig. Singh, ma...

translation.en: I think it's time for a change.
We are so proud of you.
Honey, I know we’ve been hard on you,
translation.it: So che siamo stati un po' duri,

translation.en: but it’s only because your father and I want what’s best.
translation.it: ma solo perché vogliamo il meglio per te.

translation.en: [Dad] And seeing your works on display
and the effects that they're having on everybody,
translation.it: e l'effetto che ha sulla gente...

translation.en: it's obvious to us now that you're doing exactly what you're meant to do.
translation.it: Ora sembra ovvio che tu sia nata per fare questo.

translation.en: We’re just sorry we didn’t recognize it sooner.
Okay, I’m sorry. I need you just for one second.
translation.it: Scusate. Mi servi per un secondo.

translation.en: but I included a photo session with you as part of the auction.
translation.it: ma ho messo all'asta anche un servizio fotografico.

translation.en: -That photo? You used that photo? -[Sarah laughs]
It’s beautiful. Stop it. People have been bidding on it like crazy.
translation.it: È bellissima, smettila. Se lo litigheranno.

translation.en: I’ve even been giving out your info, so you are gonna have a lotta work
translation.it: Ho incluso i contatti, ti arriverà molto lavoro

translation.en: coming your way in the new year.

translation.it: - Ti voglio bene. - Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: Oh yeah, he's in the auditorium bidding on more of your art.
translation.it: Sì, è in sala a fare offerte per la tua arte.

translation.en: I am so proud of you.
Yeah. I’m just in shock over all this. That’s all.
translation.it: Sì, sono un po' scossa da tutto quanto.

translation.en: That answer might work for some people, but not me.
translation.it: Questa puoi venderla ad altri, ma non a me.

translation.en: The first person I want to tell is Josh.
It’s too late to fix it.
But you already knew that, didn’t you?
translation.it: Ma tu già lo sapevi, no?

translation.en: It wouldn’t be much of a friendship if you gave up now,
translation.it: Non sarebbe vera amicizia, se ti arrendessi così.

translation.en: I need to go do the mature thing.
translation.it: Vado a fare la donna matura.

translation.en: I wondered if I'd see you here.
-Um, about the other-- -I want to say--
You don’t have to try to make me feel better.
For what it’s worth, you did warm me up a little to...
translation.it: Per quel che vale, con te ho retto meglio

translation.en: I guess I didn't understand how much that whole calendar thing meant.
translation.it: Non ho capito quanto per te contasse il calendario.

translation.en: Those are the most important things... -[Fernando sobs]
-This is beautiful! -that we could ever give each other.
[sniffling] Hey, Abby. How are you? Hey.
I hate to be this person. Is Josh with you?
translation.it: odio chiedertelo, ma c'è Josh lì con te?

translation.en: I think he’s on a date.
I don’t know. I saw him wearing his date shirt.
translation.it: Non so, aveva la maglietta da appuntamento.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, the shirt a guy wears when he wants to make a good impression?
translation.it: Quella che mette quando vuole impressionare qualcuna.

translation.en: Not one that’s off the floor?
Or he's in Florida visiting his parents.
translation.it: O è in Florida dai suoi.

translation.en: I mean, it's a versatile shirt, really?
Well, which is it, Nando? Is it Florida? Is he on a date?
translation.it: Nando, dov'è? In Florida o con qualcuna?

translation.en: -[Abby] Hey. -[Sarah] What are you doing here?
[Abby] I just checked the trunk of my car.
I think some things in my trunk that I didn't plan on donating
translation.it: Credo che alcune delle cose donate

translation.en: Like my-- A box of gifts from Ty.
translation.it: Una scatola di regali di Ty.

translation.en: I've been looking everywhere. I can't find it.
translation.it: Ho guardato dovunque, non lo trovo.

translation.en: I think Laurie might have grabbed it.
Hey, I just-- That’s not even what I care about.
I mean, is there any chance it’s still here?
translation.it: Qualche chance che sia ancora qui?

translation.en: Yeah, well, we cleaned out. I mean, this was our biggest auction yet.
translation.it: Abbiamo venduto tutto, una grande asta.

translation.en: Maybe there’s a receipt or something.
Don't worry, Abby. I'll keep looking for it.
translation.it: Non ti preoccupare. Continuo a cercare.

translation.en: This is Josh. Leave a message.
I totally deserve the silent treatment.
You’re right. I’ve just been too wrapped up in myself
translation.it: Hai ragione. Ero troppo presa da me stessa

translation.en: to be a good friend, but I, uh--
translation.it: per essere una buona amica, ma...

translation.en: I really want to make things right.
I can't imagine not having you in my life.
[man] So, what have we got here?

translation.it: - Pronto? - C'è il sindaco in linea.

translation.en: Abby. Nice to talk to you again.
translation.it: Abby, bello parlare di nuovo con te.

translation.en: it’s so nice to- What a surprise!
Before you say anything, I just want to say I feel so terrible
translation.it: Innanzitutto volevo dirle che mi dispiace molto

translation.en: about the tree-lighting photos, and, um,
Oh, those. We had to go with another submission,
translation.it: Oh, quelle. Abbiamo scelto un'altra fotografa.

translation.en: but that’s not why I’m calling.
translation.it: Ma non chiamo per le foto.

translation.en: I was at my son's school auction

translation.it: e ho visto i tuoi ritratti ispirati.

translation.en: You did? But I was there. I didn’t--
I guess I must have missed you.
I bid on the photo session with you and won.
translation.it: Mi sono aggiudicata il tuo servizio.

translation.en: but is there any chance you could do the session later today?
translation.it: ma lo potremmo fare oggi, sul tardi?

translation.en: It's the last time I have free before heading out of town.
translation.it: Perché poi devo lasciare la città.

translation.en: But I-- I’m sorry. I don’t have a studio.
translation.it: Ma io... non ho uno studio.

translation.en: That's okay. We can do it at my home.
I'll have my assistant send you all the information.
translation.it: La mia assistente ti manderà le informazioni.

translation.en: -I look forward to seeing you again. -You, too.
I have a house full of family and they all love the camera.
translation.it: C'è tutta la mia famiglia, amano farsi fotografare.

translation.en: Yeah, that’s perfect. D'you wanna get in there, too?
translation.it: Sì, vuole entrare anche in questa?

translation.en: You have a really wonderful family, Mayor Martinez.
Well, we're all fans of yours.
I have a feeling we’ll be working together more in the future.
translation.it: Sento che lavoreremo insieme, in futuro.

translation.en: Thank you so much for coming.
[man] I love fixing these old cameras.
-All right, now it’s as good as new. -Woo! Merry Christmas.
translation.it: - Ora è come nuova. - Meno male. Grazie.

translation.en: Corinne, honey. You have one gift left.
translation.it: Corinne, amore, hai lasciato un regalo.

translation.en: That calendar that you gave me.
translation.it: Il calendario che mi hai dato...

translation.en: and it got sold at the school's auction.
angry? I mean, it was Grandma’s, and I lost it.
Your grandmother was convinced it had magical powers.
translation.it: Tua nonna credeva che fosse magico.

translation.en: She said it brought her to me.
translation.it: E che ci avesse fatto incontrare.

translation.en: What do you think about that?
That's exactly why she wanted it to go to you.
translation.it: È per quello che voleva l'avessi tu.

translation.en: Just like her, you pick the hardest path,
translation.it: Come lei, tu segui la via più difficile,

translation.en: whether it’s in your career choice or in your personal life.
She knew the time would come where you would need just a little extra help
translation.it: Sapeva che prima o poi ti sarebbe servito un piccolo aiuto

translation.en: Everything you’re working so hard for.
translation.it: e per tutto il duro lavoro svolto.

translation.en: She didn't want you to give up on your dream.
translation.it: Non voleva che rinunciassi ai tuoi sogni.

translation.en: -The three little toys. -[Abby] Those are predicting the future.
translation.it: - I tre giocattoli. - Predicono il futuro.

translation.en: Day two, I got a Christmas tree toy, and then my car ran over a Christmas tree.
translation.it: Giorno due, esce l'albero di Natale, e guarda l'incidente che poi è successo.

translation.en: [Ty] Says here we have a potential sprain by candy cane.
translation.it: Qui dice: "Possibile slogatura da bastoncino di zucchero".

translation.en: [Abby] And his daughter was dressed as a nutcracker.
translation.it: E sua figlia vestita da schiaccianoci.

translation.en: You can help me wrangle the kids.
translation.it: Tu mi aiuterai a gestire i bambini.

translation.en: Where’s Gramps? He’s in the kitchen making a cup of tea.
translation.it: - Dov'è il nonno? - In cucina, a farsi un tè.

translation.en: Do you want to help me set the table?
Josh. He dropped it by earlier this morning.
He also dropped off a whole tin of Christmas cookies
translation.it: Insieme a una scatola di biscotti

translation.en: And Josh is back in town.
-You were in on it? -In on what?
Did you help Josh buy back that calendar?
translation.it: L'hai aiutato a comprare il calendario?

translation.en: I came in early to help Sarah set up, and I saw it sitting in a pile.
translation.it: Stavo aiutando Sarah e l'ho visto sopra della roba.

translation.en: But Josh gave it back to me, right?
translation.it: Ma me l'ha spedito Josh, giusto?

translation.en: Ah. Now, that question’s not for me to answer.
But what I can tell you is
the holiday calendar watches over you.
translation.it: che il calendario veglia su di te.

translation.en: is the calendar magic or not?
translation.it: è un calendario magico, o no?

translation.en: Either way you define it, it ends up in the same place.
translation.it: Ma alla fine ritorna sempre al suo posto.

translation.en: Speaking of which, now you need to get going or you’re gonna be late.
translation.it: A proposito, devi andare o farai tardi.

translation.en: Ah, I prefer to call it romantic.
I can’t believe how long it’s taken me to realize that it’s you.
translation.it: Incredibile come non abbia capito che eri tu.

translation.en: what was in the calendar today?
You took all my hints and got me a gift. [chuckles]
translation.it: L'hai preso seguendo i miei indizi.

translation.en: You wanna get out of the cold first?
Oh, we can’t break and enter.
I mean with a little bit of work...
Why are you under the impression that I’m this broke artist?
translation.it: Perché pensi che sia un artista squattrinato?

translation.en: Because you wore an elf costume and you were living at Fernando’s.
translation.it: Perché ti vestivi da elfo e vivevi da Fernando.

translation.en: You still haven’t read my travel blog.
translation.it: Non hai ancora letto il mio blog.

translation.en: After a few months being away, I started freelancing.
translation.it: In viaggio, ho avviato una carriera.

translation.en: If you didn’t know, I’m a big deal in the travel blog world.
translation.it: Tu non lo sai, ma il blog è molto famoso.

translation.en: So you used that money to rent this place?
translation.it: E hai usato i soldi per l'affitto?

translation.en: of my parents and your Gramps.
translation.it: dei miei e di tuo nonno.

translation.en: He put a good word in for you.
I’m kind of a big deal.
♪ Your family is overseas So I'm glad you could spend it with me ♪
translation.it: UN ANNO DOPO GALLERIA "IL CALENDARIO MAGICO"

translation.en: Everyone, we just have an announcement.
